questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Application Design and Build (Domain 1)?
options: Jobs and CronJobs for Batch Work
questions.explanation: Ambassador and Adapter Patterns is a key concept in Application Design and Build. This domain covers topics essential for the Kubernetes CKAD exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with choose and use the right workload resource (deployment, daemonset, cronjob, etc.). What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any application design and build task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Application Design and Build is most closely related to understand multi-container pod design patterns (sidecar, init, adapter, ambassador)?
options: Application Design and Build governance and oversight
Application Design and Build implementation and operations
Application Design and Build assessment and testing
Application Design and Build risk management
questions.explanation: Understand multi-container Pod design patterns (sidecar, init, adapter, ambassador) falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Application Design and Build.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Application Design and Build (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Image Pull Policies (Always, IfNotPresent, Never) is a key concept in Application Design and Build. This domain covers topics essential for the Kubernetes CKAD exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when working with define, build and modify container images?
options: Following industry best practices and standards
Reducing the number of team members involved
questions.explanation: When working with define, build and modify container images, following industry best practices ensures consistent and reliable results.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Choose and use the right workload resource (Deployment, DaemonSet, CronJob, etc.)" in Application Design and Build?
options: To implement and manage choose and use the right workload resource (deployment, daemonset, cronjob, etc.) processes
To evaluate compliance with application design and build standards
questions.explanation: Choose and use the right workload resource (Deployment, DaemonSet, CronJob, etc.) is a key objective in Application Design and Build. Understanding this concept is essential for the exam.
